name: teddy
description: A charting and component library for New America data visualization projects

scripts.build-storybook: build-storybook -c .storybook -o .storybook/dist && aws s3 sync .storybook/dist s3://datadotnewamerica/components-library && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E15K2IVEDI1Y6H --paths "/components-library/*"

author: lorenries
